This is not exactly developer-specific but the NSA leaks story has been a huge story with a lot of details. This documentary is the best video I've seen that explains a lot of information on the issue.
Part 2 explains the technical details of NSA spying on traffic of Silicon Valley companies and their response (especially Google).
The United States of Secrets: A 2-parts Frontline documentary on the NSA surveillance and the Snowden leak http://www.pbs.org/wgbh/pages/frontline/united-states-of-secrets/#part-one---the-program 
If you have other videos/films/documentaries that talks about this issue, please share.
posts.caption: www.pbs.org
posts.description: How did the government come to spy on millions of Americans?

posts.message: I think the issue is now under investigation / development effective a few hours ago after another press article on the same topic, but still starring the issue might help get Google to take it more seriously.
